author: World Champ Tech

changelog.release_notes:
What's new in this version:

1. Walk+ now works over Bluetooth LE - you can now launch the app, and toggle recordings all without ever opening the companion iPhone app.
2. A fresh, revised interface for Pebble Time Round
3. Updates for the Pebble Classic and Pebble Steel Classic for Pebble 3.8.

What's new in this version:

1. Additional memory and performance improvements.

What's new in this version:

1. Memory usage improvements.

What's new in this release: 

1. Updated for Pebble Time with color maps! 
2. Improved app efficiency with 15% better battery life Pebble Time!

What's new in this release:

1. Added support for 24h time.

What's new in this version:

1. Improved reliability of connection to iPhone.
2. Added support for steps for iPhone 5S, iPhone 6, and iPhone 6+.

What's new in this version: 

1. Walk+ users can now get trail hazard alerts in the app as they walk! 
2. Completely updated for version 2.5 firmware with many bug fixes and significant improvement in memory usage for better app performance.

What's new in this version: 
1. Added data screen with Pebble battery and iPhone battery levels. 
2. Added data screen with temperature, wind speed, and wind direction. 
3. Performance enhancements.

description:
Walk+ is the only walking app developed by World Champion Athletes!

Walk+ integrates seamlessly with the Walk + iOS App to display walk time, pace, distance, altitude, grade, total climbing , and more. Users can start and stop walk recordings, toggle segment timers, and view maps all from the convenience of your wrist.

title: Walk+
